member.name: T:MongoDB.Driver.GridFS.DelegatingStream
member.summary: Represents a Stream that delegates all of its operations to a wrapped Stream.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.GridFS.DelegatingStream.BeginRead(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins an asynchronous read operation. (Consider using instead; see the Remarks section.)
member.param: The buffer to read the data into.
The byte offset in at which to begin writing data read from the stream.
The maximum number of bytes to read.
An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the read is complete.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous read request from other requests.
member.returns: An that represents the asynchronous read, which could still be pending.
member.exception: Attempted an asynchronous read past the end of the stream, or a disk error occurs.
One or more of the arguments is invalid.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.
The current Stream implementation does not support the read operation.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.GridFS.DelegatingStream.BeginWrite(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins an asynchronous write operation. (Consider using instead; see the Remarks section.)
member.param: The buffer to write data from.
The byte offset in from which to begin writing.
The maximum number of bytes to write.
An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the write is complete.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous write request from other requests.
member.returns: An IAsyncResult that represents the asynchronous write, which could still be pending.
member.exception: Attempted an asynchronous write past the end of the stream, or a disk error occurs.
One or more of the arguments is invalid.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.
The current Stream implementation does not support the write operation.

member.name: P:MongoDB.Driver.GridFS.DelegatingStream.CanRead
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports reading.
member.returns: true if the stream supports reading; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:MongoDB.Driver.GridFS.DelegatingStream.CanSeek
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports seeking.
member.returns: true if the stream supports seeking; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:MongoDB.Driver.GridFS.DelegatingStream.CanTimeout
member.summary: Gets a value that determines whether the current stream can time out.
member.returns: A value that determines whether the current stream can time out.

member.name: P:MongoDB.Driver.GridFS.DelegatingStream.CanWrite
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports writing.
member.returns: true if the stream supports writing; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.GridFS.DelegatingStream.Close
member.summary: Closes the current stream and releases any resources (such as sockets and file handles) associated with the current stream. Instead of calling this method, ensure that the stream is properly disposed.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.GridFS.DelegatingStream.CopyToAsync(System.IO.Stream,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously reads the bytes from the current stream and writes them to another stream, using a specified buffer size and cancellation token.
member.param: The stream to which the contents of the current stream will be copied.
The size, in bytes, of the buffer. This value must be greater than zero. The default size is 81920.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests. The default value is .
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous copy operation.
member.exception: is null.
is negative or zero.
Either the current stream or the destination stream is disposed.
The current stream does not support reading, or the destination stream does not support writing.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.GridFS.DelegatingStream.CreateObjRef(System.Type)
member.summary: Creates an object that contains all the relevant information required to generate a proxy used to communicate with a remote object.
member.param: The of the object that the new will reference.
member.returns: Information required to generate a proxy.
member.exception: This instance is not a valid remoting object.
The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.GridFS.DelegatingStream.CreateWaitHandle
member.summary: Allocates a object.
member.returns: A reference to the allocated WaitHandle.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.GridFS.DelegatingStream.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.GridFS.DelegatingStream.EndRead(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Waits for the pending asynchronous read to complete. (Consider using instead; see the Remarks section.)
member.param: The reference to the pending asynchronous request to finish.
member.returns: The number of bytes read from the stream, between zero (0) and the number of bytes you requested. Streams return zero (0) only at the end of the stream, otherwise, they should block until at least one byte is available.
member.exception: is null.
A handle to the pending read operation is not available.-or-The pending operation does not support reading.
did not originate from a method on the current stream.
The stream is closed or an internal error has occurred.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.GridFS.DelegatingStream.EndWrite(System.IAsyncResult)

member.param: A reference to the outstanding asynchronous I/O request.
member.exception: is null.
A handle to the pending write operation is not available.-or-The pending operation does not support writing.
did not originate from a method on the current stream.
The stream is closed or an internal error has occurred.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.GridFS.DelegatingStream.Flush
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, clears all buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.
member.exception: An I/O error occurs.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.GridFS.DelegatingStream.FlushAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously clears all buffers for this stream, causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device, and monitors cancellation requests.
member.param: The token to monitor for cancellation requests. The default value is .
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous flush operation.
member.exception: The stream has been disposed.

member.summary: Obtains a lifetime service object to control the lifetime policy for this instance.
member.returns: An object of type used to control the lifetime policy for this instance. This is the current lifetime service object for this instance if one exists; otherwise, a new lifetime service object initialized to the value of the property.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.GridFS.DelegatingStream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
member.param: An array of bytes. When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between and ( + - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
The zero-based byte offset in at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the buffer. This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.

is null.
or is negative.
An I/O error occurs.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.GridFS.DelegatingStream.ReadAsync(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream, advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read, and monitors cancellation requests.
member.param: The buffer to write the data into.
The byte offset in at which to begin writing data from the stream.
The maximum number of bytes to read.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests. The default value is .
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation. The value of the parameter contains the total number of bytes read into the buffer. The result value can be less than the number of bytes requested if the number of bytes currently available is less than the requested number, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the stream has been reached.
member.exception: is null.
or is negative.
The sum of and is larger than the buffer length.
The stream does not support reading.
The stream has been disposed.
The stream is currently in use by a previous read operation.

member.summary: Reads a byte from the stream and advances the position within the stream by one byte, or returns -1 if at the end of the stream.
member.returns: The unsigned byte cast to an Int32, or -1 if at the end of the stream.
member.exception: The stream does not support reading.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.
